title: what is driving mode?
content:
Can someone give me an overview of Driving Mode? 
I think it is used to connect to Android Auto, but I don't have that.
When using Spotify, I see a very different display - big white letters on a black background - not the usual Spotify song display.  Is Driving Mode doing that?
What else is it changing?  doing?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
